title: Survival Analysis
text: This is a Survival Analysis with R website. The reference text is Collett2023. 1

title: Survival Analysis
text:
1 Contents

Survival R
Non-parametric survival analysis
Cox regression model
Model checking Cox regression
Parametric regression models

A companion website is ykwongWebR.

Tested

title: Survival Analysis
text:
Footnotes


Collett, David 2023.Modelling Survival Data in Medical Research. Fourth Edition. CRC Press.↩︎

title: Workflow
text: RStudio: Edit WebSurvival in Rstudio. Rendering creates and updates the _site folder with all site(html) files.

title: Workflow
text: RStudio: Edit WebSurvival in Rstudio. Rendering creates and updates the _site folder with all site(html) files.

title: Workflow
text:
2 RSync

rsync _site to local GitHub Desktop site via sh rsyncWebSurvival.sh

title: Workflow
text:
3 Desktop Github

Updated files appear in Desktop Github
** Add Summary Comment ** and Commit to main
Upload to Github.com repository

title: Workflow
text:
4 Continuous deployment

WebSurvival is currently deployed to public github ykwongsuss.github.io
